nodes.bodyText:
I ran the following command and it generated this part. Not sure if I need to do something different.

yarn ace pom --fix
Based on what we have left in this profile, looks like a good candidate to remove
nodes.diffHunk:

              description="This will install all the applications for development purposes."
              start-level="3">

nodes.bodyText: I was a little torn on removing it from there, but I suppose it can be added to a policy later that uses resource management
